content: b'@JayPrimetown Chiellini came out other day saying Juve have struggled since Ronaldo\xe2\x80\x99s quick exit. Even Allegri hasn\xe2\x80\x99t had enough time to recalibrate their system which was entirely geared towards a unique player. \nOle hasn\xe2\x80\x99t had a pre season to sort Utd\xe2\x80\x99s system out to cater towards Ronaldo.'

b'Everyone was at a standstill last night. Those who played that game Viz posted had their hearts in their mouth,but fortunately, Chiellini got the win for us. Only for @betwaycanada to not give @Vizzy_rayven the money won. Unfair. @BetwaySupport please fix this.'
b'when conte signs 52 year old chiellini on a 4 year deal>>>> https://t.co/zzscC12kmU'

b'@FabrizioRomano So happy. He is a tactical genius who can play many formations. He was proven in EPL and won it. He brings the best out of United rejected players like Young, Darmian, Sanchez, Lukaku. He promoted superstars like Pogba, Vidal, Barela, Bonucci, Chiellini,etc. Love him, DON CONTE\xf0\x9f\x87\xae\xf0\x9f\x87\xb9'
b"@joe_cappuccino_ Probably why J Medical is so useless, it's actually a cover for a human cloning facility where they are working on making replicas of Chiellini and Bonucci to avoid this problem"

b'@imabozotbh @brianjimenez333 @utdarena So what? Is just a cup match. We are talking about consistency. All i know about Zidane is his team full of superstars and he only promoted Casemiro. Conte built his own team, play his own style and promoted Pogba, Lukaku, Barella, Bonucci, Chiellini, Vidal,etc'

Chiellini- 37, bonucci-34 (both are nearing the end of their careers). Sent demiral out on loan with buy option, there is rugani who never plays. And juve will sell de light for less than 100m?'

b'@enrico_juventus @PirloBack Bonucci has been using his status, just like Chiellini. Italy won\xe2\x80\x99t change. For coaches it\xe2\x80\x99s all about senior players. Youngsters don\xe2\x80\x99t get real opportunities and aren\xe2\x80\x99t trusted to do the right thing. At least De Ligt won\xe2\x80\x99t be held back to leave Juve, that\xe2\x80\x99s a good thing.'
b'@gervinho243 Exactly. Chiellini is old and Bonucci nearly. MDL is learning by them. And we are close to sign with Romagnoli (Milan) to get our back younger'

b'As I think about the events that unfolded this weekend I think Ronaldo\xe2\x80\x99s leadership must be questioned especially in the GOAT talk. At Real he had Ramos, Marcelo and Pepe. At Juve he had Chiellini and Bonucci. For Portugal he had Quaresma and Pepe. At ManU he has no one right now'

b"@AllJuveCast Between sitting on the bench and having to play next to Rugani, I wouldn't be surprised if de Ligt secretly wants out. He should start every match while Chiellini/Bonucci switch to keep them healthy/rested."

b'@enrico_juventus That will be one of many reasons yeah. All players rotate but De Ligt only rotates in big games, it makes no sense. De Ligt must always be the first name on the team sheet. It\xe2\x80\x99s ironic how with Chiellini we have a bad record vs big teams the last 2 season'

b"@Juve_Dani8 I understand your vision my friend , for me De Ligt is our starter, that's clear. But Chiellini is still one of the best center backs in the world, I think he and De Ligt can work very well playing together."

b"@enrico_juventus I'm not saying that, it's just time De Ligt starts more and Bonucci as well. Chiellini can rotate with one of them, but not in big games. Clearly Chiellini is better than so many players at this age, no agenda against Chiellini, but I was not satisfied with his perf. yesterday"
b'@visse264 @PirloBack I think you forgot to say that Chiellini is among the 30 best players of the season, because of his European. How Bonucci screwed De Ligt?'

b"@PirloBack Yesterday, he did 7 tackles, won 3 duels in the floor and 4 in the air, against Milan 4, against Napoli he was simply the player with the highest score of the defensive line... beyond he's the starter in Italy and did a fantastic European, put some respect on Chiellini"
b'@emaxstatman @NizaarKinsella Ok so if the geniuses sell Deligt with Bonucci and Chiellini entering their Jurassic period, then what afterwards? They also sold Demiral.'

b'@PirloBack @enrico_juventus It\xe2\x80\x99s down to Italian pride and Allegri\xe2\x80\x98s favouritism that Chiellini still gets to play. But De Ligt is a right CB, he shouldn\xe2\x80\x99t even be in a fight with Chiellini. It\xe2\x80\x99s Bonucci that screwed De Ligt\xe2\x80\x99s Juve career (and of course the coaches that kept on playing him).'

b'@GopiAnujith @enrico_juventus De Ligt would stay if he was prioritised but Allegri favours Chiellini in big games because he\xe2\x80\x99s old and Italian and Mancini\xe2\x80\x99s other choices are Acerbi and Bastoni. It\xe2\x80\x99s written in the stars that De Ligt will leave and Romagnoli replaces him'

Because of him (also Allegri) De Ligt will leave and in one two years when he retires we\xe2\x80\x99ll double fucked.'
b'@emaxstatman @NizaarKinsella I hope he leaves, we have Chiellini and Rugani. \n\nDe Ligt has future and talent, but Juventus is the club to fuck up your talent.'
